articles.author: Ana Paula Pereira
articles.title: Ripple applies for crypto license in the United Kingdom - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Payment protocol Ripple has recently applied for a registration as a crypto asset firm in the United Kingdom.
articles.content: Payment protocol Ripple has recently applied for a registration as a crypto asset firm with the United Kingdom's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), a spokesperson for the firm told Cointelegraph. The… [+2151 chars]

articles.description: The family office of Ravi Ruia purchased the Hanover Lodge mansion overlooking Regent's Park at 150 Park Road this month.
articles.content:
Hanover Lodge is an early nineteenth-century Grade II-listed mansion house.
